title: Engage
subtitle: Instant Lead Engagement
description: The moment a lead shows interest, our AI Virtual Agent initiates a dynamic, personalized conversation via call or text, ensuring zero delay.
label: Start Conversation

title: Qualify
subtitle: Intelligent Qualification
description: The AI agent nurtures the conversation, asking key qualifying questions and adapting based on real-time responses to gauge motivation and readiness.
label: Qualification

title: Handoff
subtitle: Seamless Handoff
description: Once a lead is qualified, the AI either schedules them directly on your calendar or initiates a live 'hot-transfer' to an available agent for immediate closing.
label: Schedule or Transfer
